ocean.question: I'm big and blue and full of water. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have waves.
🐠 Fish live in me.
🚢 You need a boat to cross me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. I'm very slow. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.
🐢 I am a type of reptile.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am a cephalopod.
🧠 I am a very smart animal.
🎨 I use ink to hide from predators.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean. I sing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I have a blowhole.
❄️ Some of my kind migrate to colder waters.
🐋 I am the largest animal on Earth.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and many teeth. I swim in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 Some people are afraid of me.
⚔️ I am a predator.
🌊 I have gills to breathe underwater.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish that hides in the sand. I can shock you if you step on me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️ I can deliver an electric jolt.
🏖️ I bury myself to stay hidden.
🐡 I'm a flat fish.

ocean.question: I am a cold, floating chunk of ice. I can be dangerous to ships. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of frozen water.
🚢 The Titanic sank after hitting one of me.
🏔️ Only a small part of me is visible above the water.

ocean.question: I am a strong, swirling current in the ocean. I can affect the weather. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am like a river within the ocean.
☀️ I carry warm water from the equator.
🌍 I help regulate Europe's temperature.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean. Light doesn't reach me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 It is very dark down there.
🧭 I am located in the western Pacific Ocean.
🌊 I am a trench.

ocean.question: I am a ring-shaped coral reef surrounding a lagoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🏝️ I often form around a submerged volcano.
🐠 I am home to diverse marine life.
💍 I am like an island necklace.

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, but I'm not a star. I travel around a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Werewolves howl at me!
🧀 Sometimes people say I'm made of cheese.
🌎 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a hot ball of gas that gives light and heat. The Earth travels around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 Plants need me to grow.
😎 You need to wear sunglasses on a bright day because of me.
🌞 I am at the center of our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am the planet we live on. I have lots of water and land. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am the only planet known to have life.
🔵 I look blue from space.
🌍 Humans, animals, and plants all live here.

cosmos.question: I am a big, cold planet with rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 My rings are made of ice, dust, and rocks.
💨 I am the second-largest planet in our solar system.
💍 I am famous for my beautiful rings.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 The Big Dipper is a part of me.
✨ Sailors used to use me to navigate.
🌠 I have names like Orion and Ursa Major.

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps your feet on the ground and planets in orbit. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree helped discover me.
⚖️ I measure your weight.
🌎 I hold everything on Earth down.

cosmos.question: I am a very, very far away group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is inside one. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 The Milky Way is my name!
🌀 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me clearly from Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a rock or metal object that orbits the Sun, but I am smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Some are found in a belt between Mars and Jupiter.
💥 Sometimes, I crash into planets and moons, making craters.
🌑 Ceres and Vesta are well-known examples of me.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of dust and gas in space, often where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I can be very colorful and beautiful.
💨 The Orion Nebula is a famous example of me.
🌠 I am often called a stellar nursery.

cosmos.question: I am a region of spacetime exhibiting such strong gravitational effects that nothing, not even light, can escape from inside it. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I am created by the death of a massive star.
🌑 Event Horizon surrounds me.
⏳ I warp space and time around me.
